languages.text: "Каждый из нас стал жертвой сей бездны. Цвета каждого... были нарушены. Загрязнены. Мы оставили здесь куда больше, чем кровь и плоть".
"Each of us has fallen victim to this abyss. The colours of each... have been broken. Sullied. We have left far more than blood and flesh here."
languages.original_text: "Каждый из нас стал жертвой сей бездны. Цвета каждого... были нарушены. Загрязнены. Мы оставили здесь куда больше, чем кровь и плоть".

traits.locale_text: "Each of us has fallen victim to this abyss. The colours of each... have been broken. Sullied. We have left far more than blood and flesh here."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Each of us has fallen victim to this abyss. The colours of each... have been broken. Sullied. We have left far more than blood and flesh here."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Each of us has fallen victim to this abyss. The colours of each... have been broken. Sullied. We have left far more than blood and flesh here."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Each of us has fallen victim to this abyss. The colours of each... have been broken. Sullied. We have left far more than blood and flesh here."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: “我们每个人都是这片深渊的受害者。每一个人的颜色……都遭到了撕碎、玷污。我们在这里留下的，远不止我们的血肉。”
languages.original_text: "Each of us has fallen victim to this abyss. The colours of each... have been broken. Sullied. We have left far more than blood and flesh here."

traits.locale_text: “我们每个人都是这片深渊的受害者。每一个人的颜色……都遭到了撕碎、玷污。我们在这里留下的，远不止我们的血肉。”
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: « Chacun de nous a été victime de ces abysses, d'une manière ou d'une autre. Nos couleurs sont comme... brisées. Souillées. Nous n'avons pas été blessés que dans notre chair. »
languages.original_text: "Each of us has fallen victim to this abyss. The colours of each... have been broken. Sullied. We have left far more than blood and flesh here."

traits.locale_text: « Chacun de nous a été victime de ces abysses, d'une manière ou d'une autre. Nos couleurs sont comme... brisées. Souillées. Nous n'avons pas été blessés que dans notre chair. »
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: «Cada uno de nosotros ha sido víctima de este abismo. Nuestros colores... se han roto. Manchado. Hemos perdido más que carne y sangre aquí».
languages.original_text: "Each of us has fallen victim to this abyss. The colours of each... have been broken. Sullied. We have left far more than blood and flesh here."

traits.locale_text: «Cada uno de nosotros ha sido víctima de este abismo. Nuestros colores... se han roto. Manchado. Hemos perdido más que carne y sangre aquí».
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: 「私たちはそれぞれこの奈落の餌食になりました。各人の色が…弱まり、汚れたのです。私たちはここにある血肉よりもはるかに多くを見捨てました」
languages.original_text: "Each of us has fallen victim to this abyss. The colours of each... have been broken. Sullied. We have left far more than blood and flesh here."

traits.locale_text: 「私たちはそれぞれこの奈落の餌食になりました。各人の色が…弱まり、汚れたのです。私たちはここにある血肉よりもはるかに多くを見捨てました」
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Jeder von uns ist diesem Abgrund zum Opfer gefallen. Unser aller Farben ... wurden gebrochen. Besudelt. Wir haben hier sehr viel mehr zurückgelassen als nur Blut und Fleisch."
languages.original_text: "Each of us has fallen victim to this abyss. The colours of each... have been broken. Sullied. We have left far more than blood and flesh here."

traits.locale_text: "Jeder von uns ist diesem Abgrund zum Opfer gefallen. Unser aller Farben ... wurden gebrochen. Besudelt. Wir haben hier sehr viel mehr zurückgelassen als nur Blut und Fleisch."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.original_text: "Each of us has fallen victim to this abyss. The colours of each... have been broken. Sullied. We have left far more than blood and flesh here."

languages.text: "Her bizimiz bu boşluğun kurbanıyız. Her birimizin renkleri soldu, lekelendi. Burada kan ve etten daha fazlasını bıraktık."
languages.original_text: "Each of us has fallen victim to this abyss. The colours of each... have been broken. Sullied. We have left far more than blood and flesh here."

traits.locale_text: "Her bizimiz bu boşluğun kurbanıyız. Her birinin renkleri soldu, lekelendi. Burada kan ve etten daha fazlasını bıraktık."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion
